title: january 19: el chapo escapes
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about (one of) the drug lord Joaquin ‘El Chapo’ Guzman’s escapes from prison. Afterwards, she remembers legendary artist Mac Miller. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
